Interaction Callback Type.name: CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
Interaction Callback Type.description: respond to an interaction with a message

Interaction Callback Type.name: DEFERRED_CHANNEL_MESSAGE_WITH_SOURCE
Interaction Callback Type.description: ACK an interaction and edit a response later, the user sees a loading state

Interaction Callback Type.name: DEFERRED_UPDATE_MESSAGE*
Interaction Callback Type.description: for components, ACK an interaction and edit the original message later; the user does not see a loading state

Interaction Callback Type.name: UPDATE_MESSAGE*
Interaction Callback Type.description: for components, edit the message the component was attached to

Interaction Callback Type.name: APPLICATION_COMMAND_AUTOCOMPLETE_RESULT
Interaction Callback Type.description: respond to an autocomplete interaction with suggested choices

Interaction Callback Type.name: MODAL**
Interaction Callback Type.description: respond to an interaction with a popup modal

Messages.name: flags?
Messages.description: message flags combined as a bitfield (only SUPPRESS_EMBEDS and EPHEMERAL can be set)

Messages.name: attachments? *
Messages.description: attachment objects with filename and description

Modal.name: custom_id
Modal.description: a developer-defined identifier for the component, max 100 characters

Modal.name: title
Modal.description: the title of the popup modal, max 45 characters

Modal.name: components
Modal.description: between 1 and 5 (inclusive) components that make up the modal
